notes.note: Enrollment is limited to: DEA majors, permission of instructor for non-DEA majors. Prerequisite: Option I majors must take DEA 1101 in fall of first year. B- or higher in DEA 1101 required to take DEA 1102 and 1150. Must complete incomplete grade in DEA 1101 before taking 1102 and 1150. Cost of materials: approx. $200.

Enrollment is limited to: DEA majors, permission of instructor for non-DEA majors. Prerequisite: Option I majors must take DEA 1101 in fall of first year. B- or higher in DEA 1101 required to take DEA 1102 and 1150. Must complete incomplete grade in DEA 1101 before taking 1102 and 1150. Cost of materials: approx. $200.
Registration fee: $15.00.

Prerequisite: Option I DEA students; DEA 1101, 1102, 1110, 1150, and 1500 (minimum grades of B-); B- or higher required to take DEA 2202. Must complete incomplete in 2201 before taking 2202. Co-register: DEA 2150, DEA 2510, DEA 4600. Cost of materials: approx. $150; lab fee: $40; required field trip: approx. $130.
Priority given to DEA seniors, juniors, sophomores, freshmen. Prerequisite: DEA 1500 and written permission of instructor. Field trip fee: $65

course.subject: DEA
course.course_title: Introduction to Facility Planning and Management

notes.note: Prerequisite: interior design, hospitality, or architectural studio, or permission of instructor. Cost of materials: approx. $10.
Recommended: DEA 1500.

Prerequisite: DEA 1110, 1500, 2201, 2202, 2030, and 2040. Co-register: DEA 3030 and 4590. Must complete incomplete grade in this course before registering for DEA 3302. Cost of materials: approx. $150; shop fee: $10; optional field trip fee: approx. $10.
Prerequisite: DEA 3302, 3030, 3040, and 3050. Must complete incomplete grade in this course before registering for DEA 4402. Cost of materials: approx. $150; field trip: $50.

course.subject: DEA
course.course_title: Inside-Out Ergonomics II: Biomechanics and the Built Environment

notes.note: This course is open to any junior or senior level student. Recommended prerequisite: DEA 3250; DEA 3500.
Enrollment is limited to juniors and seniors. Priority given to DEA Seniors.
Cost of materials: approx. $100.

Enrollment is limited to DEA majors. Preference given to ID majors. Not open to freshmen for credit. Students are required to take this course in order to participate in field study trip to a major city. Field trip fee covers cost of hotel and chartered bus. Course fee: approx. $150 (fee will be charged to student's bursar bill when they register for the course). Field trip dates for 2011 are 9/29/2011-9/30/2011.
Preference will be given to DEA undergraduate students from all three options.
Preference will be given to DEA undergraduate students from all three options.
Enrollment limited to: Graduate students. (Undergraduate seniors outside of DEA with permission of instructor.)
Recommended prerequisite: DEA 2040. Cost of materials other than books: approx. $50.
Seniors and Graduate Students in DEA are encouraged to enroll. All others by special permission of instructor.
Seniors and Graduate Students in DEA are encouraged to enroll. All others by special permission of instructor.
Cost of materials: approx. $100.
Recommended prerequisite: DEA 1500.
